snippet.title: Asterism - Official Character Trailer [Upcoming RPG / VN]
snippet.description:
Invisible demons are hiding everywhere. Can you see them like us?

Asterism is an upcoming astronomy-themed RPG VN that combines turn-based combat in a modern fantasy setting with visual novel story telling. The game centers around Kotachi Asterio, a high schooler who can see shadow monsters most other people can't. Together with a group of friends, he attempts to save the Zodiac— a group of human constellations that are under attack by these shadow monsters called specters.

➡️ Wishlist Asterism on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1093830/Asterism/

Play the Asterism demo on Steam or Itchio!

🌌 Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/vE2Yng4

🌠 Other games on Itchio: https://crystalgameworks.itch.io/

Asterism is by Crystal Game Works. This trailer is by Howard Jones.
